text:
The bonds may be canceled in their entirety or as to any officer covered thereby: (1) by written notice given to the surety or insurer by the Controller of the City and County, or (2) by not less than 30 days' written notice given by the surety or insurer to the Controller of the City and County. Such cancellation notices shall be sent by registered mail. 
(Added by Ord. 69-00, File No. 000356, App. 4/28/2000)
